page.title: 10How People Look.
page.content:
We carried out a{statistical survey}of the pupils in our school. We wanted to find out how tall they were and a little about their colouring.These are our results. {Mean Height:} 9yrs. 1m 35cm 10yrs 1m 41cm 11yrs 1m 46cm 12yrs 1m 49cm 13yrs 1m 44cm 14yrs 1m 58cm 15yrs 1m 60cm {Median Shoe size:} 9yrs. 2 10yrs 3 11yrs 4 12yrs 5 13yrs 5 14yrs 6 15yrs 5 {Modal Eye Colour:} Blue.
{Modal Hair Colour: }Light brown.
{Mean Head Span:} 9yrs. 53cms. 10yrs. 51cms. 11yrs. 52cms. 12yrs. 55cms. 13yrs. 53cms. 14yrs. 55cms. 15yrs. 55cms.
